name: map-generator
description: A simple web application to take in a list of zip codes and/or latitude + longitude, and plot points onto a US map.

scripts.buildDev: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode development --config webpack.server.config.js && webpack --mode development --config webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.buildProd: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.config.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.prod.config.js

author: Michael J Brown
